description:
Shinto priest with magic abilities; head of the Yamigumo clan. Lives at the Shinto shrine three hundred meters underground owned by his family; his granddaughter http://anidb.net/ch13445 [Nami] visits this location in episode 7.
He had a leading position in the "http://anidb.net/ch25784 [Project Gaia]" many years ago, thus puts Nami (as http://anidb.net/ch25714 [AMP] member) in charge of correcting the mistakes that he and his son http://anidb.net/ch25788 [Razan] made back then; details about this are disclosed only in the manga.
name: Yamigumo Kouhou
